extensionAttribute.description: Displays the name of the baseline file that is being used
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh # # mSCP-BaselineVersion.sh # Written by Jordan Burnette (jburnette@vcu.edu) # Last updated 2022.03.24 ###### Description # Lists all items in /Library/Preferences, greps for any plist that starts with org and ends in audit.plist, # then prints the 9th section of that content as the result for the EA ######
result=$(ls -l /Library/Preferences | grep "org.*.audit.plist" | awk '{print $9}') /bin/echo "$result"
